title: vite react antd
content:
技术选型

方案 1: nextjs + sun (antd)

之前部门用的公司（前端基建二次封装）的这套组合，被现在的部门嫌弃

方案 2: @umijs/max

试用了 umijs/max MFSU, 在开发更新体验上还是觉得慢

方案 3: vite + react + antd + ahooks + axios + antv + canvas(svg) + ts + i18next

  • react 读 hook 部分源码
  • ahooks 读过源码
  • axios 读过源码
  • canvas(svg) 部分可视化定制要求高，antv 无法实现
  • i18next 对外系统需要多语言，没有使用公司多语言平台的原因，项目不大，没必要，更何况，当前部门希望创新

最终选择了这套方案

没用 redux 原因：全局使用 context，局部使用 hooks 组合的方式

ts 全局声明配置

proxy

alias

{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ESNext",
    "useDefineForClassFields": true,
    "lib": ["DOM", "DOM.Iterable", "ESNext"],
    "allowJs": false,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "esModuleInterop": false,
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "strict": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "module": "ESNext",
    "moduleResolution": "Node",
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "noEmit": true,
    "jsx": "react-jsx",
    "paths": {
      "@/*": ["./src/*"],
      "@/components/*": ["./src/components/*"]
    }
  },
  "include": ["src"],
  "references": [{ "path": "./tsconfig.node.json" }]
}

配置完成仍然提示

Cannot find module '@/components/test' or its corresponding type declarations.

解决： vscode 重新启动

终极解决 TS 或者 Vetur 报错，Cannot find module ‘@/xx/xxx‘，找不到*.vue 等编译问题

打包优化

见完整配置

  • 移除日志
  • 移除 debuger
  • 集成 lodash 测试下打包优化
  • antd 按需加载
  • antd 定制主题
  • 请求工具封装

打包分析

open ./stats.html -a Google\ Chrome

考虑到项目中仅用到图表

所以将 @ant-design/charts 替换为 @ant-design/plots 子包试用

包大小降低了一丢丢，感觉不对

如何部署

这是一个问题，之前我看有同事，用 vite 开发，用 webpack 打包部署

打包问题，最终变成vite 产物 dist 部署问题。

我也尝试了多次使用 next 部署方案，进行部署，由于不晓得运维内部是如何写 dockerfile 的，所以是各种报错

Dockerfile

FROM nginx:1.15.0

ADD .docker/nginx.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
ADD .docker /

COPY  ./dist /www/

RUN chmod -R 755 /www

CMD [ "sh", "/start.sh" ]

start.sh

# 注入环境变量
sed -i "s/\(<head>\)/\1<script>window.ENV='$TYA_ENV';window.REGION='$TYA_REGION'<\/script>/" "/www/index.html"

nginx -g "daemon off;"

nginx

server {
    listen       80;
    server_name  localhost;

    location =/health {
        return 200 ok;
    }

    # 这个路径是业务方自己要加的，在上传组件的时候，他们希望直接使用脚本上传组件，通过这个接口获取 token数据
    location /_/token {
         add_header Content-Type 'text/html';
         add_header Cache-Control 'no-store'; // 缓存
         return 200 $cookie_SSO_USER_TOKEN;
    }

    location / {
        add_header Cache-Control 'no-store'; // 缓存
        if_modified_since off; // 缓存
        etag off; // 缓存
        expires -1; // 缓存
        root /www/;
        index          index.html;
        try_files $uri /index.html;
    }

    gzip on;
    gzip_min_length 1k;
    gzip_buffers 4 16k;
    gzip_comp_level 2;
    gzip_types text/plain application/javascript application/x-javascript text/css application/xml text/javascript application/x-httpd-php image/jpeg image/gif image/png;
    gzip_vary off;
    gzip_disable "MSIE [1-6]\.";
    error_page   500 502 503 504  /50x.html;
}

记录

打包预览 404

预览默认启动 index.html,肯定没有这个 react-router-dom 的路径 ，会走到 404

修改 index.html 代码

index.html 

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta name="Keywords" content="项目" />
    <meta name="Description" content="项目" />
    <!-- <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/vite.svg" /> -->
    <link
      rel="shortcut icon"
      href="https://images.com/rms-static/4d08a150-2f4a-11ed-acd5-2f6ea556a3fd-1662623168485.ico"
      type="image/x-icon"
    />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <title>碳项目</title>
  </head>

  <body>
    <div id="root"></div>
    <script type="module" src="/src/main.tsx"></script>

    <!-- fix代码，将/index.html 改为 / -->
    <script>
      if (window.location.pathname === "/index.html") {
        window.location.pathname = "/";
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

完整配置

package.json 

{
  "name": "smart-carbon",
  "private": true,
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "tsc && vite build",
    "preview": "vite preview" // 注意避坑 404
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@ant-design/icons": "^4.7.0",
    "@ant-design/plots": "^1.2.2", // @ant-design/charts的一个子包，还是有点大； 之后可以学习下svg、canvas绘图，这样打出的内容非常小
    "ahooks": "^3.7.0",
    "antd": "^4.23.0",
    "axios": "^0.27.2",
    "classnames": "^2.3.1",
    "i18next": "^21.9.1",
    "lodash": "^4.17.21", // 这个依赖完全是为了测试vite lodash 打成bundle
    "moment": "^2.29.4",
    "react": "^18.2.0",
    "react-dom": "^18.2.0",
    "react-i18next": "^11.18.6",
    "react-router-dom": "^6.3.0",
    "rollup-plugin-external-globals": "^0.6.1",
    "vite-plugin-imp": "^2.3.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/lodash": "^4.14.184",
    "@types/node": "^18.7.15",
    "@types/react": "^18.0.17",
    "@types/react-dom": "^18.0.6",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^2.1.0",
    "less": "^4.1.3",
    "rollup": "^2.79.0",
    "rollup-plugin-terser": "^7.0.2",
    "rollup-plugin-visualizer": "^5.8.1",
    "typescript": "^4.6.4",
    "vite": "^3.1.0",
    "vite-plugin-compression": "^0.5.1"
  }
}

vite.config.ts 

// vite.config.ts
import { defineConfig } from "vite";
import react from "@vitejs/plugin-react";
//@ts-ignore
import path from "path";
import vitePluginImp from "vite-plugin-imp";
import externalGlobals from "rollup-plugin-external-globals";
import viteCompression from "vite-plugin-compression";
import { terser } from "rollup-plugin-terser";
import { visualizer } from "rollup-plugin-visualizer";
const __dirname = path.resolve();
// 一些需要单独打成bundle的文件
const chunk1 = ["react", "react-router-dom", "react-dom"];
const chunk2 = ["moment", "@ant-design/icons", "ahooks"];
const chunk3 = ["lodash"];
const chunk4 = ["axios"];
const antdChunk = ["antd"];
const plotsChunk = ["@ant-design/plots"];

const build = {
  rollupOptions: {
    output: {
      // 文件指纹
      chunkFileNames: "static/js/[name].[hash].js",
      entryFileNames: "static/js/[name].[hash].js",
      // 分类输出
      assetFileNames: "static/[ext]/[name].[hash].[ext]",
      // 手动chunk
      manualChunks: {
        vendor: chunk1,
        vendor2: chunk2,
        vendor3: chunk3,
        vendor4: chunk4,
        plots: plotsChunk,
        antd: antdChunk,
      },
    },
  },
  chunkSizeWarningLimit: 1024,
};

const server = {
  port: 3006,
  open: "/index.html",
  proxy: {
    "/api": {
      target: "http://localhost:3032",
      changeOrigin: true,
      // rewrite: (path) => path.replace(/^\/api/, '')
    },
  },
};

const plugins = [
  react(),
  vitePluginImp({
    libList: [
      // antd 按需引入
      {
        libName: "antd",
        style: (name) => `antd/es/${name}/style`,
      },
    ],
  }),
  externalGlobals({
    // "@ant-design/charts": "window.charts"
  }),
  // vite打包优化 - 压缩
  viteCompression({
    verbose: true,
    disable: false,
    threshold: 10240,
    algorithm: "gzip",
    ext: ".gz",
  }),
  // vite 打包优化 - 移除 日志/debugger
  terser({
    compress: {
      defaults: false,
      // drop_console: true,
    },
    mangle: {
      eval: true,
      module: true,
      toplevel: true,
      safari10: true,
      properties: false,
    },
    // 不输出注释
    output: {
      comments: false,
    },
  }),
  // vite 打包分析
  visualizer(),
];

// https://vitejs.dev/config/
export default defineConfig({
  plugins,
  css: {
    // 配置antd主题
    preprocessorOptions: {
      less: {
        javascriptEnabled: true,
        modifyVars: {
          // 在这里自定义主题色等样式
          "@primary-color": "#646cff", //设置antd主题色
        },
      },
    },
    // 模块化样式，启用小驼峰
    modules: {
      localsConvention: "camelCase",
    },
  },
  // 路径别名，简化长路径引入，看着不舒服
  resolve: {
    alias: {
      "~": path.resolve(__dirname, "./"), // 根路径
      "@": path.resolve(__dirname, "src"), // src 路径
    },
  },
  server,
  build,
});

ts 全局声明配置

优点：必要的全局声明，可以极大减少 typescipt 类型的引入

/src/@types

.
├── index.d.ts
└── react-i18next
    └── index.d.ts

1 directory, 2 files

// react-i18next
//     └── index.d.ts
import "react-i18next";
import { resources } from "../../src/i18n/config";

declare module "react-i18next" {
  type DefaultResources = typeof resources["en"];
  interface Resources extends DefaultResources {}
}
// index.d.ts
declare interface MenuConfig {
  name: string | React.ReactNode;
  icon?: React.ReactNode;
  path?: string;
  asPath?: string;
  pattern?: RegExp;
  isMenu?: boolean;
  hidden?: boolean;
  routes?: MenuConfig[];
  onClick?: () => void;
  layout?: React.ReactNode;
  component?: React.ReactNode;
  icon?: React.ReactNode;
  isShow?: boolean;
  pageName?: string;
  redirect?: string;
}

declare interface IResultData<T> {
  code: string; // 响应码
  result?: T; // 数据
  data?: T;
  success: boolean; // 是否成功(true：成功，false：失败)
  msg?: string; // 错误信息(请求成功时无该字段)
  errorMsg?: string;
  message?: string;
}

i18n-ally 插件

插件之前安装好的，大概在几个月前，使用还是正常的，经历过几次 vscode 升级，嗝屁了

试着重新安装了几次，确定不行，断定是配置出的问题，可视化配置，直接搜 i18n

以下为setting.json统一配置（不在每个项目中建立啥的配置文件，麻烦）， 直接在setting.json中配置如下

"i18n-ally.extract.autoDetect": true,
"i18n-ally.extract.keyMaxLength": 1,
"i18n-ally.theme.annotation": "rgba(153, 153, 153, .8)",
"i18n-ally.theme.annotationBorder": "rgba(153, 153, 153, .8)",
"i18n-ally.theme.annotationMissing": "#d37070",
"i18n-ally.theme.annotationMissingBorder": "#d37070",
"i18n-ally.extract.parsers.html": {

},
"i18n-ally.displayLanguage": "zh",
"i18n-ally.enabledFrameworks": [
  "react",
  "vue"
],
"i18n-ally.extract.ignoredByFiles": {

}
